summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 29100,entitled: "An ordinance providing for the establishing of the grades of an elevated viaduct and bridge for street purposes, from the west margin of 1st Avenue South to the westerly margin of Railroad Avenue along the south side of Yesler Way, all in the City of Seattle,; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor and providing that the cost of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law", approved March 18, 1912.
